titleStmt.title: Samuel G. Suddarth, Receipt to Daniel W. Lindsey
CWG13774

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.idno: QMG Box 10; Folder 1864 Clothing, Camp & Garrison Equipage, Telegraph Expenses, Some Claim Letters; Bundle 1

body.p:
NO. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To D. W. Lindsey, Dr.

row.cell: To services rendered in administering and organizing the Kentucky State Militia from the 1st November 1863 to the 31st day of March 1864

body.p: Approved and the Q. M. Genl is ordered to pay this claim out of the State Militia fund.
I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the services were rendered as stated, and that they were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Genl. of Ky.
Received at the of 186, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, dollars and cents, in full of the above account.

NO. 22.
The State of Kentucky,
To D. W. Lindsey, Dr.

row.cell: To services rendered in administering and organizing the Kentucky State Militia from the 1st November 1863 to the 31st day of March 1864.

body.p: Approved -- and the Q. M. Genl. is Ordered to pay this claim out of the State Militia fund
I certify that the above account is correct and just, and that the services were rendered as stated, and were necessary for the public service.

S. G. Suddarth
Quarter-Master Genl. of Ky.
Received at the of 186, of S. G. SUDDARTH, Quarter=Master General for the State of Kentucky, dollars and cents, in full of the above account.

1. Militia
No. 22.
No. Abstract.
D. W. Lindsey
Dollars $1125.00/100
Paid March 22d, 1864.
(1)
